thread.title: Church Attendance Increases in Conservative Poland
thread.title_full: Church Attendance Increases in Conservative Poland

author: Nick Hallett
title: Church Attendance Increases in Conservative Poland
text: The wife (L), son (C) and mother (R) of Lukasz Urban, the Polish truck driver who was killed in the Berlin Christmas market attack, attend his funeral at the church of Banie near Sczczecin, Poland, on December 30, 2016. Lukasz Urban was shot dead probably by suspected jihadist killer Anis Amri shortly before the market attack, in which 11 other people were killed and almost 50 injured when the truck tore through the crowd, smashing wooden stalls and crushing victims, in scenes reminiscent of July's deadly attack in the French Riviera city of Nice. / AFP / Odd ANDERSEN (Photo credit should read ODD ANDERSEN/AFP/Getty Images)
